subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Erik Bedard allowed two hits over six innings to win his seventh decision in a row, and the Baltimore Orioles beat the host Boston Red Sox, 5-3, last night despite two home runs by David Ortiz.
snippet: Erik Bedard allowed two hits over six innings to win his seventh decision in a row, and the Baltimore Orioles beat the host Boston Red Sox, 5-3, last night despite two home runs by David Ortiz.
